local_intent: Ensure visibility and correct yaw, then push along the cloth edge to form the fold and verify visibility afterward.
assumptions: Cloth is on the table within reach
Gripper is open and gentle contact/approach has been established prior to push
Valid target reference for cloth and cloth_edge
coherence_with_global: Matches the global plan: confirms visibility, enforces yaw 90Â°, performs Push(target=cloth_edge, distance=0.1, direction_deg=90, timeout_ms=1500), and verifies visibility. Aligns with the transfer step preceding wipe/wait/retreat.
